workshoptitle: AI Services: Introduction to OCI Language

tutorials.title: Before You Start
tutorials.description: Sign up for and log into the Oracle Cloud

tutorials.title: About OCI Language Service
tutorials.description: Learn how to discovers insights in unstructured text using natural language processing

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Analyzing Text with Pre-Trained Models
tutorials.description: Learn how to use pre-trained models to analyze text

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Creating and Using Custom models to analyze text
tutorials.description: Learn how create, train and use Custom Models to analyze text

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Translating text using OCI Language Service
tutorials.description: Learn how to use OCI Language API to translate text across langauges

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
